instance_template: time(1..n). at(x, l, T) :- time(T). at(x, r, T) :- time(T).
generator: { boat(P, T) } :- at(f, S, T), at(P, S, T), passenger(P).

hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1 { at(P, l, T) ; at(P, r, T) } 1 :- passenger(P), time(T), P!=x. 1 { at(f, l, T) ; at(f, r, T) } 1 :- time(T).
:- at(w, S, T), at(g, S, T), not at(f, S, T).
:- at(g, S, T), at(c, S, T), not at(f, S, T).
at(P, r, T+1) :- boat(P, T), at(P, l, T), P!=x, T<n. at(P, l, T+1) :- boat(P, T), at(P, r, T), P!=x, T<n. at(f, r, T+1) :- boat(_, T), at(f, l, T), T<n. at(f, l, T+1) :- boat(_, T), at(f, r, T), T<n.
at(P, S, T+1) :- passenger(P), not boat(P, T), at(P, S, T), P!=x, T<n.
at((f ; w ; g ; c), r, n).
